snippet: Suzann Pettersen of Norway beat the teenage star Lydia Ko of New Zealand by two shots to win the Evian Championship in France and clinch her second career major title.
abstract: Suzann Pettersen wins Evian Championship in France and clinches her second career major title in golf.
lead_paragraph: Suzann Pettersen of Norway beat the teenage star Lydia Ko of New Zealand by two shots to win the Evian Championship in France and clinch her second career major title.
